Restlet Extensions 2.1 Release Candidate 3 - Google Web Toolkit

Restlet Extensions extend the Restlet API and the Restlet Engine.

See:
          Description

Standards support
org.restlet.client.ext.json Support for JSON representations.
org.restlet.client.ext.xml Support for XML and XSLT representations.

 

Restlet Extensions extend the Restlet API and the Restlet Engine. This documentation corresponds to the Google Web Toolkit edition.

The Restlet Framework is led by Restlet S.A.S. with the help of the Restlet community.

See Also:
REST dissertation by Roy T. Fielding
